text: 🚨 New study in The Lancet Public Health reveals a strong link between hospital privatization and worse patient care! 🚨Researchers at Oxford University analyzed data from 13 longitudinal studies across high-income countries, uncovering troubling trends in patient outcomes after healthcare service privatization. 🩺Findings highlight:✅ Decreased staffing levels & higher doctors' workload✅ More patients with private insurance and fewer uninsured individuals✅ Reduced number of services provided✅ Increased avoidable hospitalizations 😷As a champion for healthcare as a human right, these results reaffirm the need for robust public healthcare systems that prioritize equitable access to quality care for all! #HealthcareForAll 🌍❤️‍🩹
